quote_last: “Then let’s go and find out if he’s still awake.”
title: Be Careful What You wish For
author: Jeffrey Archer

quote_last: Michael Vance, Eva Borodin, and Aleksei Novosty were luckier than they knew. When they emerged, the Japanese guard Jiro Sato had stationed at the Burleigh entrance had momentarily been called away by radio to confer at the Strand corner.
title: Project Daedalus
author: Thomas Hoover
